title: Trump vs Harris Debate: What Are The Rules?

title: What Is The Key Difference Between Heart Attack And Cardiac Arrest
content: The heart is a muscle that contracts to work as a pump. When it contracts it pushes blood  containing oxygen and nutrients  to all the tissues of our body.
summary: The heart is a muscle that contracts to work as a pump. When it contracts it pushes blood  containing oxygen and nutrients  to all the tissues of our body.

title: El Salvador Police Chief, Man Accused Of $35 Million Fraud Killed In Crash

title: Minors Raped, Women Trafficked: The Murky World Of "Appointed Son Of God"
content: Late on Sunday in the southern Philippines, police arrested Apollo Quiboloy, a self-proclaimed "Appointed Son of God" and pastor of the Kingdom of Jesus Christ (KOJC) church, after an extensive manhunt spanning more than two weeks.

title: Plane Carrying 48 Passengers Skids Off Indonesia Runway, Several Injured
content: A plane with 48 people aboard skidded off the runway in Indonesia's remote eastern region of Papua on Monday, police said, injuring several passengers.
summary: A plane with 48 people aboard skidded off the runway in Indonesia's remote eastern region of Papua on Monday, police said, injuring several passengers.

title: PM Modi, UAE Crown Prince Meet In Delhi, Hold Bilateral Talks
content: The Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi has met Prime Minister Narendra Modi today in New Delhi as he begins his first official trip to India as the Crown Prince. The two leaders have begun talks to further bilateral ties between India and the UAE.

title: South Korea Is Facing Deepfake Porn Crisis

title: Why Night Owls Are At Higher Risk Of Diabetes
content: Night owls -- a person who is habitually active or wakeful at night -- tend to have a higher body mass index (BMI), larger waists, and more hidden body fat and thus are almost 50 per cent more likely to develop type 2 diabetes (T2D).
summary: Night owls -- a person who is habitually active or wakeful at night -- tend to have a higher body mass index (BMI), larger waists, and more hidden body fat and thus are almost 50 per cent more likely to develop type 2 diabetes (T2D).

title: Historian's 13-Key Method Predicts A Kamala Harris Win In US Election
content: Forget the polls, ditch the data and stop sending journalists to swing-state diners to interview undecided voters: historian Allan Lichtman already knows who is going to win the US presidential election.
summary: Forget the polls, ditch the data and stop sending journalists to swing-state diners to interview undecided voters: historian Allan Lichtman already knows who is going to win the US presidential election.

title: AI Started As A Dream To Save Humanity. Then, Big Tech Took Over.
content: Many AI builders say this tech promises a path to utopia. Others say it could bring about the collapse of our civilization. In reality, the science-fiction scenarios have distracted us from the more insidious ways AI is threatening to harm society.

title: How Olympic Rings On Eiffel Tower Turned Into Political Battle In France
content: The Olympic rings will remain on the Eiffel Tower until at least 2028, Paris Mayor Anne Hidalgo has announced. The rings were mounted ahead of the Paris Olympics and became a popular tourist attraction.

title: As Gaza War Rages, Netanyahu Rival Calls Iran, Hezbollah "Real Issues"

title: Watch: Drone Helps Rescue 3-Year-Old Lost In Dark Corn Field In US
